header: Euplea - Itinerary in the Cultural Eritage
Subject: Subject
Itinerary title: Itinerary about {{subject}} for {{days}} days with style {{style}} in {{region}}
DataSources1: This webapp allows you to search on the <2>cultural heritage database</2> of <6>the Ministry of Culture</6> made available as <10>Linked Open Data</10>.
DataSources2: The accomodations and amenities data are retrieved from <2>OpenStreetMap</2> using <6>Sophox</6> and <10>Overpass Turbo</10>.
DataSources3: The data are displayed on the map using <2>leaflet</2> and the underlying map is provided by <6>OpenStreetMap</6>.
LicenceKey: This webapp is licenced under the <2>Apache License 2.0</2> and the source code is available on this <6>repository<6>.
